API.GEXPlayer: GE Members Ranking info has been updated

Boxes.Alerts.Form.Persistence.Descriptio: Should the notification remain open until the user dismisses or clicks the notification
Boxes.Alerts.Form.Tag.Description: Tags can be used to group notifications (a new notification with a given tag will replace an older notification with the same tag)
Boxes.Alerts.Form.Title: Title
Boxes.Alerts.Permissions.Default: Enable notifications in your browser to use this feature
Boxes.Alerts.Permissions.Denied: Notifications have been disabled. To enable notifications in your browser settings navigate to chrome://settings/content/notifications and then refresh this page.
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Auction.Info: Automatically create a new alert when I make a bid in the Antiques Dealer Auction
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Auction.Title: Antiques Dealer Auction
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Battlegrounds.I: Send an instant alert when there is a high activity in the Guild Battlegrounds (for example, 10 fights in a single sector within 5 seconds). Please note that this function works only when the Guild Battlegrounds are open in game!
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Early.Info: Automatically generated alert times (Antiques Dealer, Guild Battlegrounds etc) will use this offset to send notification before the event actually happens. For example, setting this value to 30 (seconds), Auction alerts will be displayed 30s before the auction actually ends!
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Early.Title: Notify Early Offset
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.InGame.Info: Show in-game notification instead of the native Desktop notification when the game window is focused
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.InGame.Title: In-game Notifications
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.MenuIcon.Info: Show the next alert countdown as an overlay of the Main Menu icon
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.MenuIcon.Title: Main Menu Countdown
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Start.Info: Display a list of Alerts which expired while offline (since the game window was closed)
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Start.Title: Expired Alert Summary at Start
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Suggestions.Inf: Display alert suggestions (for example, when clicking on a Battleground sector, or collecting a building production)
Boxes.BattleAssist.Text.NextEra: You have lost a future era unit. However you still have the chance to heal them with diamonds!
Boxes.BattleAssist.Text.Rogue: Your army has only Rogues. Either heal units using diamonds or retreat!
Boxes.BattleAssist.Title: Warning!
Boxes.BlueGalaxy.NoProductionsDone: There are no finished FP productions
Boxes.BlueGalaxy.TTGoodsValue: This value is used for ranking buildings producing goods. How many FP is one good worth to you?
Boxes.BlueGalaxy.Title: Blue Galaxy helper
Boxes.Calculator.LGNotConnected: This great building is not connected to a road.
Boxes.Calculator.LGNotOpen: This great buildings's next level is currently LOCKED.
Boxes.Calculator.TTForderFPStockLow:
ATTENTION: Not enough FP Packs in stock!
You only have __fpstock__ of __costs__FP
That is __tooless__FPs too few
Boxes.Calculator.TTForderNegativeProfit:
Spot is not safe. __fpcount__ additional FPs must be added.
Total to make spot safe: __totalfp__FPs
Boxes.Calculator.TTLevelWarning:
Adding __fpcount__ FPs too many!
Maximum investment: __totalfp__ FPs
Boxes.Calculator.TTLoss:
Reward = __nettoreward__ (Net Reward) X __arcfactor__% (Arc Bonus) = __bruttoreward__
Cost: __costs__ - Place locked at: __safe__
Loss = __costs__ (Cost) - __bruttoreward__ (Reward) = __loss__
Boxes.Calculator.TTPaidTooLess: You paid __paid__ FPs instead of __topay__ FPs. That is __tooless__FPs too few.
Boxes.Calculator.TTPaidTooMuch: You paid __paid__ FPs instead of __topay__ FPs. That is __toomuch__FP too many.
Boxes.Calculator.TTProfit:
Reward = __nettoreward__ (Net Reward) X __arcfactor__% (Arc Bonus) = __bruttoreward__
Cost: __costs__ - Place locked at: __safe__
Profit = __bruttoreward__ (Reward) - __costs__ (Cost) = __profit__
Boxes.Calculator.Title: GB Cost Calculator

Settings.About.Desc: The FoE Helper is a free browser extension for Forge of Empires developed for players by players. The tool is not affiliated with InnoGames.
Settings.About.RatingDesc: If you like what you see and what we do, please leave a good review in the Store!
Settings.About.Title: About FoE Helper
Settings.About.TranslateDesc: You can help translating the extension by signing up for our translation tool:
Settings.AutoOpenInfoBox.Desc: Should the Infobox open itself automaticaly after game start?
Settings.AutoOpenInfoBox.Title: Auto open Infobox
Settings.AutomaticNegotiation.Desc: Automatically Open/Close the Negotiation Assistant when negotiating? Not available in Guild Battles.
Settings.AutomaticNegotiation.Title: Negotiation helper
Settings.ChangeLanguage.Desc: Choose your prefered language from the drop-down list
Settings.ChangeLanguage.Title: Change Language
Settings.ExportImport.Error: This is not a valid settings file!
Settings.ExportImport.Reload: The game will now reload with the imported settings.
Settings.ExportSettings.Title: Saving and restoring
Settings.GlobalSend.Desc:
If you want to track data with your guild, activate this point.
For a self-sufficient extension simply disable.
Settings.GlobalSend.Title: Upload/Send data to foe-rechner.de
Settings.Help.Desc: There are several ways to get support:
Settings.Help.Discord: Discord: join our server for general discussions about the extension, chats and support.
Settings.Help.Forums: Forums: go here for support and submitting ideas, aswell as bug reports.
Settings.Help.Github: GitHub: for more technical bug reports, concrete ideas and helping with development.
Settings.Help.Title: Help and Community
Settings.Help.Website: Website: information on the extension and a documentation of it's features.
Settings.InfoboxEntryCount.Desc:
How many elements should the Infoboard show and save?
Empty or "0" means infinit.
Settings.InfoboxEntryCount.Title: Infoboard Entry Count
Settings.MenuLength.Desc:
How many elements high should the menu be?
Empty or "0" means automatic height.
Settings.MenuLength.Title: Menu Length

This is the position you have chosen.
Before you test the next position, wait until this message disappears.

Settings.SendGEXInfo.Desc: When clicking in the GE on placements or rankings the data transmitted
Settings.SendGEXInfo.Title: GE evaluations

Settings.ShowInvestments.Desc: Show sums of your FP investment data when entering 'Town Hall'> 'News'> 'Great Buildings' tab.
Settings.ShowInvestments.Title: Show FP Investment sums
Settings.ShowMarketFilter.Desc: Shows a tool for filtering trades when opening the market
Settings.ShowMarketFilter.Title: Show market filter tool

Should the motivation activities be tracked when the events are called?

Reload game after conversion

Settings.ShowRougeUnitWarning.Desc:
Put a box over the button "Attack" or "Autocombat" to prevent a defeat if only agents are left after the first wave.
If precious units of the next age have been killed, this box gives you the possibility to heal them with diamonds.
Settings.ShowRougeUnitWarning.Title: Show battle assists
